attributes.action: Suspend all MP's being investigated for expenses issues and call an election to allow the people to decide if they remain morally fit to stand and represent their constituents on their behalf
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As in any occupation bringing it into disrepute leads to disciplinary action. MP's while legally correct have shown themselves to be morally unelectable and should either stand down or ask for re election. The status Quo is wrong as such damage has been done to the political system that either a change of MP's or system or both are urgent if faith is to be restored.

rejection.details:
A petition to call an election already exists: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/

Suspension of MPs is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
